mapper.insert: insert into t_org(org_date, i_theater, i_program) values(#{orgDate}, #{orgThNo}, #{orgPgNo});
mapper.update: update t_org set org_date = #{orgDate}, i_theater = #{thNo}, i_program = #{pgNo} where i_org = #{orgNo};
mapper.select: select * from t_org org join t_theater th using(i_theater) join t_program pg using(i_program) order by org.org_date asc;
select * from t_org org join t_theater th using(i_theater) join t_program pg using(i_program) where i_org = #{orgNo};
